channel.title: Copying death notes
channel.description:
One of the things I like about ToL is not knowing what class killed someone unless the physician exhumes them. However, death notes stop this. I cannot make players think that someone was killed by the reaper if the reaper leaves a death note, as my computer is too slow to handle such precise drawing.
This is why I want to be able to copy another death note on a body onto your own death note. Adds more flavor to the game, more uncertainty, and more strategy for bad guys.

item.title: Copying death notes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Tryphon made some point about the artists having the rights tot he drawings made in game.

They don’t.

Also, luxx, you are acting like I want to plagiarize your death notes for the glory of it. I don’t, I want to copy them so people think I am you, if that makes sense. I want to confuse the BD as an evil.

Simon:

i cant speak for others, but i was only talking about copy-ing already used deathnotes from a game for that game.

i dont really know how that changes things, but i wanted to put that out there

I am talking about copying a death note onto your death note for the duration of the game, no storage between games.

í42-Xblade:

As for OTHER people (non-i42) using other people’s deathnotes … it’s not technically against the rules, but:

It’s considered super douchey and frowned upon.
SOMEONE will catch you and call you out, then you will likely be relentlessly shamed. We will not save you.
IF you’re going to do something douchey like this, at LEAST credit them or ask them for permission.

I want to do it so that I can pretend to be another killer class, not so that I get the glory of a good death note.

Read full topic

item.title: Copying death notes

item.description:
i cant speak for others, but i was only talking about copy-ing already used deathnotes from a game for that game.
i dont really know how that changes things, but i wanted to put that out there

item.title: Copying death notes
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
https://www.ThroneOfLies.com/legal/terms.html

Content Liability and Use of Content/Ideas

Although we welcome feedback, ideas, suggestions, feedback, submissions, and anything posted on the Imperium42 forum, in-game, on Discord, one of our social sites, or any contact or site of or relating to Imperium42 or Throne of Lies becomes copyrighted, intellectual property (IP) of Imperium42. This statement is so that no one attempts to sue us if we use an idea that is either of our own or otherwise similar or the same as an idea submitted in the aforementioned locations. Please do not submit ideas, art or anything you would not intend for Imperium42 to use as their own IP. Although most situations, Imperium42 will do our best to credit what Imperium42 considers “major ideas”, it is not guaranteed.

Regardless of what is actually said in any content of, or relating to, Imperium42 and/or Throne of Lies, by using our games, sites and services, you hereby agree that any and all submissions become property of Imperium42 (in the form of a worldwide, perpetual, unrestricted, irrevocable license) and that Imperium42 may use such submitted content for any purpose in any form - in either public or private matters.

Know what you guys agreed to when you play ~

TL;DR: We can use anything relating to our game that was made, posted, submitted, drawn, etc. However, we’ll try our best to credit you (we don’t HAVE to, but we do it because we’re not douchebags)

As for OTHER people (non-i42) using other people’s deathnotes … it’s not technically against the rules, but:

  1. It’s considered super douchey and frowned upon.
  2. SOMEONE will catch you and call you out, then you will likely be relentlessly shamed. We will not save you.
  3. IF you’re going to do something douchey like this, at LEAST credit them or ask them for permission.

Read full topic

item.title: Copying death notes
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I don’t understand why you would argue that death notes must either be copyable or disabl2d for ranked .
currently there are strategies that are possible within the current system and changing the system would make different strategies available .

but the crux is their is no inherent issue with the current system . it is a flat and level playing field and any player can use their own deathnote or not as they tactically choose to do so . They cannot however use other people’s death notes .This is a rule of the game . This is no different to any other established rule in the game.
the tactical advantages gained and lost by this being an established game rule make no difference to a casual game or a competitive game .
You have yet to prove why it is a detrement to the game and equality of play , but are alreadylooking to implement a change to fix a problem that does not exsist

Read full topic

item.title: Copying death notes
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Actually, it can be.

Why you think in certain games like Bendy and the Ink Machine actually ask user’s fan art to be used as posters around the game? Because if they did without it, they would be breaking the law, and they could technically have legal action taken against them

Read full topic

item.title: Copying death notes

item.description:
But something in somebody else’s video game literally cannot be yours, even if we still talk copyright.

Read full topic

item.title: Copying death notes
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
This is what me and try were talking about in the back when I was thinking about doing that lecture with friends.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/370920903493681153/370922758915227653/236C2VN.png

(perhaps the law should be reworded and come under public games as well?)

So yeah. If this was implemented, it would then cause really bad issues. I think from the evidence that I just showed you will suggest that this will likely not go ahead at all.

I think the best thing we can do from this point is move. Laws are made to be followed. Break it and face the consequences.

This has been a little lesson with Lawyer Wolfy

Read full topic

item.title: Copying death notes
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Can we please stop strawmanning this and discuss the actual issue?

It’s not any sort of major problem, but good points are being made, and if a competitive mode is ever added (for some God-forsaken reason) death notes should either be disabled or have a feature like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Copying death notes
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
Simon:

Im trying to implement a system that discourages stealing while keeping the strategic aspect possible by copying a death note

The problem is you cannot make a system based on copying someone else’s work and make it discourage art theft at the same time.

Unless you make it so you auto-lose if you do it, there’s no way to make it possible.

I would also like to direct you all to my class suggestion Artist https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-artist/2949/
The whole idea of the class suggestion is to cause people to question “who killed who” based on death notes alone.

And idea like that wouldn’t work if everyone could access the ability of stealing someone’s death note.

Read full topic
